preqs: Students must have passed AFF2401, BFF2401, BFW2401 or AFW2401 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFF2401, AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {AFF3331%, AFW3331, AFX3331%, BFF3331, DEB333, DEB3331%, FIN333, FIN3331}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFW3331, AFX3871, BFW3331, BFX3871}

description: The international monetary system, the international parity conditions, the foreign exchange market, international financing strategies and techniques, the Euromarkets, and multinational banking.
